info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:31PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Schenectady, northeastern Albany, southern Saratoga, east central Montgomery and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction, or near Scotia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Cohoes, Scotia, Mechanicville, Glenville, Niskayuna, Green Island, Waterford, Hagaman, Round Lake, Rotterdam Junction, East Glenville, Burnt Hills, Country Knolls, Center Brunswick, Alplaus and Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 26. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 7. Interstate 87 near exit 7, and between exits 8A and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
